data.title: Section 1 Standouts
data.meta_description: Posts about Ben Gordon written by Matt Spillane
data.text:
High School: Mount Vernon

College: UConn (Division 1)

NBA team: Detroit Pistons

Years as a pro: 6

Position: Guard

January 17, 2011 against Dallas Mavericks: 28 minutes, 11 points and 3 assists in a 103-89 win.

High School: Mount Vernon

College: UConn (Division 1)

NBA team: Detroit Pistons

Years as a pro: 6

Position: Guard

January 15, 2011 against the Sacramento Kings: 31 minutes, 16 points, 5 rebounds and 3 assists in a 110-106 win.

High School: Mount Vernon

College: UConn (Division 1)

NBA team: Detroit Pistons

Years as a pro: 6

Position: Guard

January 12, 2011 against the Memphis Grizzlies: 23 minutes, 25 points and 4 assists in a 107-99 loss.

High School: Mount Vernon

College: UConn (Division 1)

NBA team: Detroit Pistons

Years as a pro: 6

Position: Guard

January 10, 2011 against the Chicago Bulls: 26 minutes (started), 5 points, 4 rebounds, 2 assists and 2 steals in a 95-82 loss.

High School: Mount Vernon

College: UConn (Division 1)

NBA team: Detroit Pistons

Years as a pro: 6

Position: Guard

January 3, 2011 against the Utah Jazz: 24 minutes (started), 14 points and 3 rebounds in a 102-97 loss.

High School: Mount Vernon

College: UConn (Division 1)

NBA team: Detroit Pistons

Years as a pro: 6

Position: Guard

December 22, 2010 against the Toronto Raptors: 19 minutes (started), 4 points and 5 rebounds in a 115-93 win.

College: UConn (Division 1)

Position: Guard

December 19, 2010 against the New Orleans Hornets: 43 minutes (started), 25 points and 7 rebounds in a 111-108 win.

High School: Mount Vernon

December 17, 2010 against the Los Angeles Clippers: 31 minutes and 15 points in a 109-88 loss.
